commit.message: Proper span for new generic param suggestion

files.patch:
@@ -26,17 +26,25 @@ error[E0658]: anonymous lifetimes in `impl Trait` are unstable

 LL | fn f(_: impl Iterator<Item = &'_ ()>) {}
-   |                               ^^
